title: Whats up with Jhin and Sona and Zed and Garen and Vi?
body: I realised that they have these wierd things when Jhin was released and it looked like he was murdering them. I know something about Zed hating Jhin or something but Sona? Garen? Vi? Ify anyone knows anything that would be good thanks :).

replies.body:
There was a video I watched with "fan theories" which I can't find now.

Something to do with these people being broken in someway and Jhin making them "perfect" through death.

Some guy posted this during the teaser of Jhin. You might find it interesting.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/123Ipmup-jhin-deadeye-teaser-meanings-revealed

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2cbftRpb,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-02-29T09:20:47.075+0000)
>
> There was a video I watched with "fan theories" which I can't find now.
> 
> Something to do with these people being broken in someway and Jhin making them "perfect" through death.
> 
> Some guy posted this during the teaser of Jhin. You might find it interesting.
> 
> http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/123Ipmup-jhin-deadeye-teaser-meanings-revealed

I was really hoping that this would be true (but the champions would be revived later of course; still waiting for Garen and Katarina's kid). But alas, it was just to raise hype and nothing more (at this point in time).
Garen and Kat had a kid = =?!

> [{quoted}](name=Icarus1314,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2cbftRpb,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-01T13:07:35.606+0000)
>
> What is rule 34??

In simplest terms, hentai.
THEY HAD A FREAKING KIDDD? OMG>> AHHH :P

> [{quoted}](name=Icarus1314,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2cbftRpb,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-02-29T14:26:38.214+0000)
>
> Garen and Kat had a kid = =?!

Well they're either going to have a kid or end up like Romeo and Juliet... SPIN2WIN BABY CONFIRMED!!!

i guess it was just random.

They had nothing to do with Jhin in the lore.
